mathara - thihagoda pradhana margaye bandaththara pradeshayedi sudu ira mathin margaya haraha gaman karamin siti pudgalayeku polis jip rathayaka gatimen eeye (04) siduwu anathurakin¬† jiwithakshayata pathwa wuna.thihagoda polis sthanayata ayath jip rathayak mangin sakakaruweku mathara adhikaranaya wetha gena yamin sitiyadiyi mema anathura siduwa aththe.jip rathaye gatunu thihagoda pradeshaye padinchi 75 hawiridi pudgalaya mathara rohalata athulath kirimen anathuruwa jiwithakshayata pathwu bawayi wartha wune.anathura sambandhayen jip rathaya padawu polis riyadura mathara polisiya wisin athadanguwata gena athi bawa sandahan.

kotuwuna athpa ya sithe hayiyen salena darupatawu kusaginna niwaduwa uduruwana kamhalata mahamagata jiwithaya sinnawena diwiye sirakaruwela hoyamu thawa nirwana kunukanduth hisamaththe suwanda sitha pinayana walalichcha ewun gana ekek natha sihikarana mayi raliya purawapu olu gedima nithi ganina ratata mona reddatada wesange nagi sandapana pandurakata gahuwothin amathila wisiwena kanna nathi kathira athi harakmaya siyalu thana paradichcha pile sita wadaninma rata hadana perethama amanun ya hama thanama gini thiyana garjanaya tharjanaya upawasa sama thana raththala nomathinam warjanaya sitha pinana bara wadima yuthukamata yatawichcha wagakima atharamada ambaarichcha minisun ya pana yadina mahalu leda pana adina pawadi ru giniganna demala muslim sihala bedana wata ini bandina rata wiruwo unu wathura kondu dige wakkeruna gedara ena wita katin hadana prathipaththi mana ipadichcha da indan kalakiruna de dakina minissuth soyanawa peranimithi niwan yana katussa...
